about_the_game:
Say what's on your mind!


Freely create memories or dreams in this narrative sandbox. Build sceneries that become the canvas to write your story onto, whatever you wish to share with other players: from fragmented thoughts to whole novels, just build and speak your mind. Create what you wish or explore what others have made, wander through and read their stories. Say is about sharing and communicating, about expressing who you were, are, or wish to be.

Say cares!


Say is a game that cares about how you feel, what you want to tell, what you've been through, what your wishes are. Players in Say share these with others in the firm believe that it is in sharing our thoughts and feelings that we can connect with them and others. No person is a monad - it is in the eyes of others that we exist. Say knows that.

Join the community!


Say lets you create atmospheric dioramas that reflect a memory, a mood, a dream. With the help of you, of the commuity, Say will become an endless vault of stories, fragments thoughts and prayers. Say invites you to join in and build a tribe of creative minds, builders, writers, and everyone who longs to share themselves. Be part of the Say Community and speak your mind.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7600K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A game about expression. Build a world, tell your story as you write thoughts into the world you've created and set the atmosphere to fit your mood. Build, write, share and explore. Come be part of the Say Community, and speak your mind!
